item.title: 斯洛伐克债务主管认为存在预算风险，乌克兰使收益率居高不下
item.description: 斯洛伐克债务管理负责人表示，在政府控制预算赤字和邻国乌克兰的战争结束之前，斯洛伐克可能会面临借贷成本上升的问题。【原文：Slovakia is likely to face elevated borrowing costs until the government reins in the budget deficit and the war in neighboring Ukraine comes to an end, according to the country’s debt management chief.】

item.title: 中国政策会议前削减钢铁产量导致铁矿石下跌
item.description: 铁矿石自 1 月中旬以来首次跌破每吨 100 美元，原因是一些钢厂削减了产量，以确保即将在北京召开的政府政策会议期间能有蓝天白云。【原文：Iron ore slumped below $100 a ton for the first time since mid-January as some steel mills curbed production to ensure blue skies during the government’s upcoming policy meetings in Beijing, where overcapacity in the industry is also likely to be a topic for discussion.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司巴什科尔托斯坦乌法炼油厂发生火灾
item.description: 俄罗斯石油股份公司（Rosneft PJSC）位于俄罗斯巴什科尔托斯坦共和国的乌法炼油厂周一早发生火灾。【原文：A fire broke out at Rosneft PJSC’s Ufa refinery in the Russian republic of Bashkortostan early Monday.】

item.title: 新加坡调查英伟达人工智能芯片出货中的潜在欺诈行为
item.description: 新加坡正在调查戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc.【原文：Singapore is investigating whether Dell Technologies Inc. and Super Micro Computer Inc. servers shipped to Malaysia housed Nvidia Corp. chips barred from China, outlining a case that’s highlighted the role of middlemen in funneling high-end semiconductors.】

item.title: PAI Partners 将获得连锁酒店 Motel One 的多数股权
item.description: 根据周一的一份声明，PAI Partners 同意成为酒店运营商 Motel One 的多数股权所有者。【原文：PAI Partners agreed to become the majority owner of hotel operator Motel One, according to a statement Monday.】

item.title: 瑞典 Alecta 旗舰 Optimal 基金回报率下降
item.description: 2024 年，瑞典养老金集团 Alecta 旗舰基金的全年回报率下降了近两个百分点，原因是其固定收益和另类资产投资组合表现相对不佳。【原文：Swedish pension group Alecta saw full-year returns at its flagship fund decline by nearly two percentage points in 2024, weighed down by the relative underperformance of its fixed income and alternative asset portfolios.】

item.title: 乌克兰谈判前景黯淡，欧洲天然气价格飙升
item.description: 美国和乌克兰领导人周五发生争执后，欧洲天然气跳涨，使最近与俄罗斯就结束战争达成协议的努力受到质疑。【原文：European natural gas jumped after US and Ukrainian leaders sparred on Friday, throwing into doubt recent efforts to reach a deal with Russia on ending the war.】

item.title: 中国外汇监管机构就特朗普关税的影响对企业进行调查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国外汇监管机构已就中美关税的潜在影响对企业进行了调查。【原文：China’s foreign exchange regulator has surveyed companies about the potential impact of US-China tariffs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: ING 购入财富管理公司 Van Lanschot Kempen 3.5 亿欧元股份
item.description: ING Groep NV 同意收购荷兰私人银行 Van Lanschot Kempen N.V. 的少数股份，以扩大其在财富管理领域的地位。【原文：ING Groep NV has agreed to acquire a minority stake in Dutch private bank Van Lanschot Kempen N.V. in a bid to expand its position in wealth management.】

item.title: 欧洲领导人表示支持乌克兰，欧洲国防类股大涨
item.description: 在贸易之门早盘交易中，欧洲国防类股大涨，欧洲斯托克 50 指数期货也有所上涨，此前该地区领导人举行会议，在担心美国撤军的情况下向乌克兰提供支持。【原文：European defense stocks surged in early trading on Tradegate, while futures for the Euro Stoxx 50 also gained ground, after the region’s leaders met to offer Ukraine their support amid concerns of a US pullback.】

item.title: 瑞士房贷基准降至 2023 年水平，房租面临削减
item.description: 瑞士的国家抵押贷款成本基准下降到了全球通胀飙升之前的水平，这有可能使该国高价住房市场上的租户面临房租下调的风险。【原文：Switzerland’s national benchmark for mortgage costs dropped to the level it had before the global inflation surge, potentially setting up tenants on the country’s high-price housing market for rent cuts.】

item.title: 土耳其通胀率降至 40% 以下，刺激降息预期
item.description: 在本周预期降息之前，土耳其 2 月份的年通胀率降至 40% 以下。【原文：Turkish annual inflation dipped below 40% in February ahead of an anticipated interest-rate cut this week.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将因国防开支前景而反弹
首席执行官承诺出售非核心资产后，新世界股价大涨
item.description: 在新世界发展有限公司首席执行官承诺削减成本并出售260亿港元（33亿美元）资产后，该公司股价创下五个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Shares of New World Development Co. rose the most in five months, after the company’s chief executive officer pledged to cut costs and sell HK$26 billion ($3.3 billion) in assets.】

item.title: PAI 据称接近以 35 亿欧元估值投资 Motel One
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，PAI Partners 将成为莫泰一号酒店的多数股权所有者，该酒店运营商的估值约为 35 亿欧元（36 亿美元）。【原文：PAI Partners is set to become the majority owner of Motel One in a deal valuing the hotel operator at about €3.5 billion ($3.6 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚二十多年来首次出现年度通货紧缩
item.description: 随着电费和一些主食价格的下降，印尼出现了二十多年来的首次年度通货紧缩。【原文：Indonesia recorded its first annual deflation in more than two decades as electricity tariffs and prices of some staple foods fell, potentially giving room for the central bank to weigh a rate cut if the rupiah stabilizes.】

item.title: 毛里求斯发现国库状况不佳，将修订预算法
item.description: 毛里求斯计划修订《财政和审计法》，在对公共财政进行审计后发现，公共财政状况十分糟糕，因此将引入基于绩效的预算编制。【原文：Mauritius plans to amend the Finance and Audit Act to introduce performance-based budgeting after an audit of public finances found they were in a dire state.】

item.title: 据说欧拉电动汽车将裁员千余人以遏制亏损
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，印度顶级踏板车制造商之一的 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 正在裁减一千多名员工和合同工，以减少不断膨胀的亏损。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. is laying off over a thousand employees and contract workers, people familiar with the matter said, as one of India’s top scooter-makers races to pare ballooning losses.】

item.title: 印度法院下令调查前市场监管局长的腐败问题
item.description: 就在印度证券交易委员会前主席任期结束几天后，一家特别法庭下令对其财务欺诈指控展开调查。【原文：A special court has ordered an investigation into allegations of financial fraud against the Securities and Exchange Board of India’s former head, just days after her term ended.】

item.title: 沙特预算摇摆不定，阿美公司 1 240 亿美元支出的未来成为焦点
item.description: 阿美石油公司（Aramco）是世界上最大的石油公司，该公司本周就其红利问题做出的关键决定将对沙特阿拉伯日益疲软的财政状况产生重大影响。【原文：Aramco’s key decision this week on its dividend — the world’s largest — is set to have major implications for Saudi Arabia’s weakening finances.】

item.title: 2024 年南非农产品出口创历史新高
item.description: 一个行业机构称，去年南非农产品出口增长了 3%，达到创纪录的 137 亿美元，其中柑橘类水果和葡萄的出口居首。【原文：South African agricultural exports rose 3% to a record $13.7 billion last year led by shipments of citrus fruit and grapes, an industry body said.】

item.title: 科技巨头岌岌可危，期权交易员寻找掩护
item.description: 在追逐大型科技股看似势不可挡的涨势两年后，期权交易员们已显露出疲态。【原文：After two years of chasing the seeming unstoppable rally in big technology stocks, options traders are showing signs of fatigue.】

item.title: 前官员警告：英格兰银行可能需要暂停降息
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）认为，通胀重现无需担心。前政策制定者则不这么认为，他们表示央行可能需要暂停降息周期。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey thinks a renewed bout of inflation is nothing to worry about. Former policymakers are less convinced and say the central bank may need to pause its interest-rate cutting cycle.】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息进入最后阶段，分歧日益扩大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行已接近其降息周期的最后阶段，内部分歧将使未来几个月的决策变得更加复杂。【原文：The European Central Bank is nearing the final leg of its interest rate-cutting cycle with internal divisions set to complicate decision-making over the months ahead.】

item.title: 环球时报》称中国可能针对美国农作物加征关税
item.description: 据《环球时报》报道，针对特朗普政府定于周二生效的关税，中国正在考虑对美国农产品和食品采取报复性措施。【原文：China is considering retaliatory measures on US agriculture and food products in response to tariffs from the Trump administration that are scheduled to take effect on Tuesday, according to the Global Times.】

item.title: 尽管面临关税威胁，高盛和美国银行仍回调看跌人民币的押注
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出对中国征收额外关税的新威胁后，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和美银证券（BofA Securities）撤回了部分看跌人民币的预测。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc and BofA Securities rolled back some of their bearish forecasts for the yuan on the heels of fresh threats from US President Donald Trump to impose additional tariffs on China.】

item.title: T.T Rowe Price 基金击败 93% 的同行，对台积电减持
item.description: 罗威集团（T.Rowe Price Group Inc. 的股票基金经理今年击败了 93% 的同行，他说他的制胜策略是淡化台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：A T. Rowe Price Group Inc. stock fund manager beating 93% of his peers this year says his winning strategy is going light on crowded trades such as Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴支持的智脉科技融资 1.4 亿美元，DeepSeek 在人工智能领域大展拳脚
item.description: 中国初创公司智璞在由地方政府支持的公司主导的一轮融资中筹集了超过 10 亿元人民币（1.4 亿美元）的资金，这凸显出继 DeepSeek 的崛起之后，人们对国内人工智能的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：Chinese startup Zhipu raised more than 1 billion yuan ($140 million) in a financing round led by local government-backed firms, underscoring the growing interest in domestic AI following DeepSeek’s ascent.】

item.title: 澳大利亚私募股权公司联合会计划 10 亿澳元拓展亚洲市场
item.description: 澳大利亚资产管理公司联邦资产管理控股公司（Federation Asset Management Holding Pty.【原文：Australian asset manager Federation Asset Management Holding Pty. plans to invest as much as A$1 billion ($623 million) over the next five years in Asia’s developed countries.】

item.title: 供应过剩加剧，中国可能重启煤炭进口管制
item.description: 据摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，在主要行业组织就全球最大的煤炭市场供应过剩问题发出警告后，中国可能重新对煤炭实施进口管制。【原文：China could reestablish import controls on coal, after leading industry groups warned on mounting oversupply in the world’s biggest market for the fuel, according to Morgan Stanley.】
